description: This talk will present an approach to resolve the "impedance mismatch" problems. It will outline the principles, which we use to "split" the logic between the application and the database, present the examples of classes that were modified and discuss performance improvement that resulted from these changes.

title: Henrietta Dombrovaskaya: New Approach to Resolve objectrelational impedance mismatch
